description.value: Eerie symbols cover your armor, inspiring terror in your foes. Frightened enemies within 30 feet that can see you must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:38|name:Dread Rune|traits:fear|showDC:all] save at the end of their turn; on a failure, the value of their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened] condition doesn't decrease that turn, no matter the value.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
